pullrequest.title: Add -std=c++11 flag to sdf_config.cmake.in and sdformat.pc.in, needed by downstream code

content.raw: We have been using c++11 internally in sdformat since at least the last sdformat prerelease, and it wasn't a problem. I believe the problem is related to recent changes that have added c++11 features to the sdformat header files, which would require all downstream users to supply the appropriate flags.
content.html: We have been using c++11 internally in sdformat since at least the last sdformat prerelease, and it wasn't a problem. I believe the problem is related to recent changes that have added c++11 features to the sdformat header files, which would require all downstream users to supply the appropriate flags.
